Blog.post: Serious & Innocent & Cute look (First time with glasses!) Hi all.. my blog finally ok liao..hahax and i decided to create a new account also till something very wrong with my template also. During week days, i lazy to go edit. now finally have time. Quite tired after a whole day of maths just now at school! :P hahaz... Haiz. i feel so lonely without love sia..... i'm desperate for love.. real love not those flirting type. anybody wan me? guys/girls also can.. Anybody wonder y i love BoA so much?. .. the really first thing i must admmit that she is very pretty! besides that she is a person full of charismatic :P She is cute.. ^^. I love the expression she carry while dancing...it is totally very attractive. for 3 years liao...i been falling in love with a person that she never knew me..... haix. I especially hate people who compare BoA & Britney ..... !!! Britney is just a slutty bitch, a bitch who showing her boobs..nothing else. BoA don't do that!. I wonder how mani people feel boring after looking at my blog hahahax.. i will try to make it as interesting as possible anyway...btw, i begin to feel...i'm not close to my class at all. Suddenly i feel i have a urge..to go cycling..see the stars at late night... hahahz...too long didn't see liao. i join astronomy club is to see that but still haven't go any session except the orientation(half-way escape away also)..hahahax. When i'm a stressful mood, i will go bike to my fav place.... near Sunshine place at my area there. There is a tower which there are seats.. i quite love that place...... and always frequent there....with a friend who is carefree also..hahahxz. That person..now change alot.....to a totally ahbeng kia...... He smokes he drinks.....and i hate people do it. He beat people for no particular reasons... sia..... bully small kids... know a lot of gang members. ..but he didn't join luckily. His way of talking totally turn me off............this happen after the long holiday.. now he don't study.....slacking around..and having a slacking job and his mindset is full of unrealistic dreams(he told me alot..of craps admition). He is much more better during his sec3, sec4.....but now become worst sia. He keep asking me out.....but than i sure find ways to reject him... Although we are buddy. but not now anyway....i guess..

hahahez yesterday forget to blog. so lets say about yesterday things that happen! At night, i teach yu hui maths and some java at McDonalds at yew tee ^^. manage to complete my tutorial 6 & past-year common test papers..hahhe. Have a fruitful time yesterday and than i remember i keep ordering drinks..hahahaz. i ordered sprite float with strawberry toppings!, medium lemon lime! yummy...i love sprite float. Till late 10pm+, we decided to go home....and than i acommpany her to go home. and have a nice good chat with her ^^.hahaz...she taught me something also..on how to convert dec no. to binary/hexidecimal.. hahaz..she also blur when teaching. ^^. yesterday at evening, xianyi also come to my house to scan some thing.... and than i keep forcing him to watch BoA videos...hahahaz. funny..sia..... he keep rejecting. i force him to watch Britney - Toxic. also..hahaz. He only keen to watch a live perf. by ayumi(the one whom she sing out of tune until very serious) hahahaz. after that, he connect his mp3 player to my com, and i realised he got record so mani of his own singings!!!!! haha.. when i'm thinking of transfering those clips, he of course try ways to prevent it. than he need to go and meet his gf(wenqi) than i meet yu hui liao .haahz. than today..as usual ..go to school...and wear grey colour contact lenses.. feel very uncomfortable when wearing colour contact lenses, dunno y sia. than manage to tahan till home....hahaz... today at school,revise some maths than got java lecture...dunno what the heck he is teaching about. hahahaz. totally blank in my mind. than break......go KFC. no money to eat as usual .. borrow $$ from ben. than eat bandito wrap?! quite nice..but oily. i'm a heath-conscious person. than back to multimedia com lab section... trying to get some sleep.while huang and lee cheng.. trying to copy something from the com !! hhaaz....cannot tell. than huang bo liao again ...out of sudden, do java. hahhhhhhhhz....than after that got maths tutorial... the quiz manage to ans.. but dunno whether got careless mistakes or not. hm..than the day end very fast, go home liao..... on the way..keep talking to huang about projects.. everytime i tok to him sure about projects...he must be very stress when talking to me sia..hahaha can saw it from his boredom face. hhaaz... than reach the sch gate.....and go home with jennifer. have a nice chat with her also !!~ .. she thought i'm ben .. lives in woodland .hahahaz...she got mixed up.. than..alight at choa chu kang station... than say byebye to her as she is rushing for bus. than i board '307' bus and realise..that my ez-link card has no value...than i told the bus driver i have no change...he give me a dao guai lan look. than i immediately walk off to top up my card.,..and than decided to walk home. on the way, listening to my mp3 player.~!~!~..keep listening to the song 'My Prayer' which is my blog background music for now. than reach home...eat lorz. hm..i'm going to brush up my photo-slideshow presentation for my big sister's grand wedding dinner..i keep my promise to her and i not going to disappoint her!! hahaz....off to work liao..if got time than do research on my projects liao..diaoz.
